page.title: 11PEOPLE IN ST VEEP & GOLANT
page.content: Most of the residents in the area are{retired}people, coming from the immediate area, other parts of the country, or from abroad. The main source of{employment is farming. Some people{travel}out of the area to other farms to work. A small number of people travel to St.Austell, Bodmin and other centres in Cornwall to work each day. They rely on their own transport to travel to and from work. A few people work in the area as {shopkeepers, publicans, marine {engineers}and{teachers. Young people, on leaving school, find it difficult to gain employment locally, but under the{Youth Training {Scheme,}some are given jobs on local farms.
